data.title: Rihanna feat Brian May? [QueenConcerts]
data.text:
bootLuca

03.01.2013 07:20 do you know what's this?

maybe is it a fan mix?

link brians wig

03.01.2013 07:37 Oh Christ. I hope it's not real.

I'm sick to death of turning on the TV to have a flick through the UK music channels and seeing bloody Rihanna all over them.

I wouldn't mind if it was any good, but it ain't my type of music.

Wish we had a channel for classic rock of the 60's, 70's & 80's...

20 music channels and all but 2 are full of modern shit on constant re-run :( tero! 48531

03.01.2013 08:32 You have music channels with actual music?!? brians wig

03.01.2013 09:10

tero! wrote: You have music channels with actual music?!?

No! That's partly the point I'm making. They're full of modern (what some people call) music ;-)

LOL cmsdrums

03.01.2013 10:26 If you're after a sort of Queen link to Rihanna, then you get one with the fact that Nuno Bettencourt from Extreme is her lead guitarist (what a waste of his talent, but probably pays massively well) PiotreQ

03.01.2013 10:36

bootLuca wrote: maybe is it a fan mix?

Fortunately - yes. john bodega

03.01.2013 11:40 Her biggest contribution to society is repeatedly running into Chris Brown's clenched fist.

It's not her fault that society didn't pay attention. brENsKi

03.01.2013 11:42 whoever "mashed" this coulda done a better job

it's ok pretending something is a special mix (feat Brian May - or whoever else)

but at least use a less obvious source for the guitars

this sounds like a direct lift from "I Want It All"

ffs - it even has some of Freddie's vocals - have a listen between 1:10 and 1:25 waunakonor

04.01.2013 21:15 The description says it's a remix, so it's not like the uploader is trying to pass this off as the real song. It's kind of nice hearing the Red Special's beautiful tone, no matter the context. Also, Freddie in some places. AlexRocks

04.01.2013 21:56 Holy shit I didn't know that about Nuno. For real?! brENsKi

05.01.2013 03:43

waunakonor wrote: The description says it's a remix, so it's not like the uploader is trying to pass this off as the real song. It's kind of nice hearing the Red Special's beautiful tone, no matter the context. Also, Freddie in some places.

that's exactly the point i was making - because one or two had "wondered" if it was for real...as in a genuine release

which it clearly isn't :-) A Word In Your Ear

05.01.2013 05:07 Personally I don't like the song, but saying that, it's one of the better mash-ups I have heard, Nice Use of the "I Want It All" Multitrack Stems. Not too much in your face. Also the "It's A Beautiful Day" intro is quite subtle too.
